title: Best of The Dan Patrick Show: 02/15/2021
itunes:title: Best of The Dan Patrick Show: 02/15/2021
description:
Jason Smith and Doug Gottlieb sit in for Dan Patrick and react to Anthony Davis’ scary injury to his Achilles tendon on Sunday night. The guys discuss how worried the Lakers organization should be and weigh in on the latest trade rumors surrounding Carson Wentz. Jason and Doug discuss Giannis Antetokounmpo’s subtle shot at the Los Angeles Lakers. Plus, MMQB Senior NFL Writer Albert Breer stops by to share what he’s heard about the biggest names that are expected to move this offseason. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
